comments.author: Mel.3064
comments.body:
Strange, Ad Infinitum and The Ascension seem to unlock the glider in the same way, I guess it just got manually whitelisted then?

It seems to be glider id 43 if you feel like manually whitelist it

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Ah, the unlock mechanism is a new one that isn’t picked up by my content reading bits.

Not sure when I’ll have that fixed.

comments.author: Mel.3064
comments.body: The Warbringer glider needs whitelisting in the API
